author: Ildefonso Ortiz
title: Confirmed Coronavirus Cases in Mexico Rise 20 Percent over Weekend
description: Mexico saw a 20 percent rise over the weekend in the number of confirmed cases of the novel Coronavirus (COVID-19).
content:
Mexico saw a 20 percent rise over the weekend in the number of confirmed cases of the novel Coronavirus (COVID-19).
During a nightly news conference, Mexicos Undersecretary of Health Hugo Lopez Gatell revealed the current number of confirmed cases at 8,261. … [+1378 chars]
